QuestionJSON.Question: Munich and their team are working on a project to build a financial ledger system for a startup. They are required to divide the task and collaborate on different parts of the project online. Consider the following parts: 1- User Interface, 2- Backend Database, 3- Transaction Processing, 4- Reporting. Which of the following could be a reasonable allocation of roles for the team members?
QuestionJSON.Answer1: Munich - Reporting, Chris - User Interface, Sam - Backend Database, Lee - Transaction Processing
QuestionJSON.Answer2: All team members working on User Interface
QuestionJSON.Answer3: Munich - User Interface, User Interface - Chris
QuestionJSON.Explanation: In order to work together effectively, each team member needs a distinct role. Irrespective of how the team decides to allocate roles, it’s important that each essential elements of the project are covered.
